name: HappyTrailz.io
description:
HappyTrailz.io is a multiplayer arcade game - that means you play with others! You can also play solo - get good first, then show your friends.

Select an Emoji and try to make a loop back to your home color to capture more area. But watch out -  if another player hits your trail, you're out!

Keep playing to unlock all your favorite Emojis and show everyone how cool you are! 😉
Emoji source art provided free by the awesome folks at EmojiOne
